I don't see debunkers here:=C2=A0 I see people trying to investigate EVP-I=
TC as a science, rather than as a religion.

And to those I would say: don'=
t give up.=C2=A0 You get a lot of insults and flack here when you question =
the religion of EVP: when you ask for good process, or repeatability, or ob=
jective testing.=C2=A0 And when you question claims that provide no substan=
tiation, or testing, or objective process.

I think this group could use mu=
ch more science, so I encourage you to participate more, and invite the mor=
e science-oriented.=C2=A0=C2=A0 It's in the marketplace of ideas, the diver=
sity of opinion,=C2=A0 the exchange of knowledge, and the crucible of the s=
cientific method, that we make the best progress.

So all you scientists, s=
tay, and bring more!=C2=A0 And all the non-scientists, I'd encourage, if yo=
u don't already, googling the Scientific Method, and giving it a shot.




=

tronics or on the media.<br>
